name: 尹秦清
objective:
指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其實務的能力，學生必須選定一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且須有書面報告。
Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.
schedule:
week 1 - week 16 專題討論與實作
week 17 - week 18 期末報告
scorePolicy:
專題討論 60%
期末報告 40%
materials: 期刊論文、個案、產業分析資料
consultation: 教師面授指導與網路溝通（Email, Line, Google meet, and Microsoft Teams)
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）

name: 田方治
objective:
指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其實務的能力，學生必須選定一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且須有書面報告。
Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.
schedule:
1~3 周  確認專題主題 -- 
4~6 周   專題項目展開及分工
7~9 周   proposal 撰寫
10~12 周  Pilot Experiment I
13~15 周  Pilot Experiment II
16~17 周  Pilot Experiment III and evaluation
18 周 Official Proposal
scorePolicy:
專題完整性及成果      50%
專題報告                     20%
進度報告                     20%
團隊合作                     10%
materials:
個人 youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@user-vc3vg4pb2i
包括: 
1. Python 程式語言
2. Deep learning using Pytorch
3. Machine vision and Its Applications
consultation: 1. 本課將定期舉行 weekly meeting，本學期訂於周四下午 5:10~6:102. 另部定期使用 google meeting 做相關事項之討論 3. 建立 line 群組及 google drive 分享磁碟，做為資料溝通之管道

name: 車振華
objective:
指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其實務的能力，學生必須選定一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且須有書面報告。
Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. schedule:
Weeks 1-2: 主題研析
Weeks 3-5: 研究方法研討
Weeks 5-8: 文獻討論
Weeks 9-12:  專題撰寫研討
Weeks 13-16: 資料分析
Weeks 17-18: 專題報告
scorePolicy:
專題參與 30%
專題計畫書 30%
專題報告 40%
consultation: 學生可經由課程 LINE 群或 E-MAIL: zhche@ntut.edu.tw 與教師討論。第十七和十八週線上教學連結會於上課前於課程 LINE 群公告。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
